NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: Time is running short. Dawn will break shortly on Timber Hearth, and rouse the native lifeforms from their rest.
2
1
CASSAVA: I believe I have drawn as much of the deadly matter from the planet's surface onto the Inspired as I am able. Concentrations have now reached an undetectable level on much of the planet.
3
2
CASSAVA: After careful calculation and execution of an additional orbit of the Inspired across the star system, I believe I have also siphoned as much of the remaining stagnant deadly matter as I am safely able to.
4 3
CASSAVA: However, narrow spaces and caverns deep underground remain beyond the reach of the Inspired's gravitational influence.
5 4
CASSAVA: In particular, <color=orange>mining site 2b on Timber Hearth</color> remains dangerously irradiated, and still poses a great threat to the native species.
6 5
CASSAVA: To protect the native species from the danger of their own curiosity, I have therefore used a <color=orange>scroll to seal the locking mechanism of the entrance</color> into the mines.
7 6
CASSAVA: Though rudimentary, I pray it will hold and serve its purpose to contain the matter within, until its danger is tempered by time.
8 7
CASSAVA: My dearest hope is that the native species of this star system will live on to explore and learn more from the universe.
9 8
CASSAVA: Now, there is only the remaining task of containing the deadly matter.
10 9
CASSAVA: ... I am ready.
11 10
CASSAVA: In my final moments, I am filled with gratitude and admiration for all that I have been able to learn and experience.
12 11
CASSAVA: The universe I was born within, and the tiny window of its life that I glimpsed - has inspired boundless curiosity in me, with both its vast terror and vast beauty...
13 12
CASSAVA: May the universe to come... receive me swiftly!
Deep Storm Station ENTERED 1
INSP R4 1
